1155040.name: SQUIDS FROM SPACE: Pay to Lose
1155040.description:
Do you love SQUIDS FROM SPACE? Do you want to support Fun Bits as we make the game EVEN BETTER?? Do you want to show off your support for Fun Bits with some SUPER FANCY COSMETIC GEAR?!?!

The SQUIDS FROM SPACE Pay 2 Lose DLC pack contains premium, exclusive cosmetic items that are guaranteed to distract your teammates and cause you to lose the game! But at least you'll be losing with style!

FULL CONTENTS LIST:
  • Steampunk Assault Mech
  • Steampunk Crawler Tank
  • Steampunk metal colors for the Assault Mech, 4x4, Moonrover, Crawler Tank, Harvester, and Squid Suit!
  • "Paid 2 Lose" and "I :heart: Fun Bits!!" accolades
  • Ruby, Sapphire, Emerald, and Opal emblems
  • Earn 2x Valor when you play, for the next 100,000 Valor you earn!
  • Fun Bits' eternal love and gratitude for supporting us! THANK YOU!! :heart: :heart:
1155040.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文
